contest-event.event-date:
May 6, 1899 D Watford Contest
Watford Contest [1800s] 0 Test Piece Contest
watford-contest
Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
Watford, Hertfordshire, England, UK
1st prize £8. 2nd prize £5. 3rd prize £3. 4th prize £2. After a protest by Barnet Band, Dunstable were disqualified for playing a professional player, 4th place awarded to Barnet.
6 bands competed
April 11, 2012, 4:22 p.m. June 25, 2017, 9:33 a.m.
1 Luton Band R. H. Cooper
2 London Silver Tom Morgan
3 John Dickinson (Apsley) Band Walter Reynolds
4 Dunstable Excelsior H. W. Dolman
5 Barnet Town John Thomas Ogden
6 Berkhamsted Volunteers James Hager
